sentences.en: a device to immobilize the car engine in case of theft
sentences.cn: 遇到有人盗车时使汽车引擎发动不了的装置

sentences.en: From this position, I know 1 1 ways I can totally immobilize you.
sentences.cn: 就这个位置, 我知道11种方法能打晕你.

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE To discuss and establish a highly effective method to immobilize antibody surface of immunosensor microarray.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨并建立一种高效免疫微阵列传感器抗体固定的方法.

sentences.en: Purpose The optimum conditions to immobilize glutamate decarboxylase ( GAD ) by sodium alginate were studied.
sentences.cn: 目的研究海藻酸钠法固定化谷氨酸脱 羧 酶的最适条件.

sentences.en: Shaman : Earthbind Totem will now immobilize all Rogues in the same zone.
sentences.cn: 萨满: 地缚图腾将对所有该地图内的盗贼起定身作用.

sentences.en: She was immobilized with a broken leg.
The broken limb must be immobilized immediately.
sentences.cn: 断肢必须立即加以固定。

sentences.en: The critical parent role is how we find weak spots and can immobilize and demoralize others.
sentences.cn: 批评家使我们能够找出弱点,打压别人.

sentences.en: Thus there is a greater calcium need to immobilize the oxalate.
sentences.cn: 因而需要较大量钙去固定草酸.

words.tran_cn: 防盗控制系统；牲畜宰前麻昏器；二氧化碳麻醉槽

trans.tran_en: to prevent someone or something from moving
